title: RootEntity

version.description: A version number in MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH format where the MINOR and PATCH fields are optional and the fields may have leading zeros (so 01.00.00 is the same as 1.0.0 or 1).

lastChange.description: The timestamp when the entity was changed the last time.

description: A standalone item in a database like a location, unit group, flow, or process. A root entity can be unambiguously identified by its id (the JSON-LD @id field), version, and lastChange fields.
